EmailTemplate.name: 18.InterTraffic-Eblast.SR1801021585EN.Email 01-
EmailTemplate.subject: Be our guest at Intertraffic 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Critical communications for safe, on time and connected journeys Efficiency today, flexibility for the future Be our guest at Intertraffic 2018 20th March – 23rd March 2018, Intertraffic Amsterdam, Hall 8, booth #08.622
Nokia is pleased to invite you to join the leading exhibition for the traffic and mobility industry in Amsterdam.
Stop by our booth #08.622 in Hall 8 Smart Mobility area to meet our experts and discover Nokia intelligent highway solutions for safe, on-time and connected journeys. We invite you to see our demos:
- Optimize highway communication networks: Learn how to benefit from a smooth migration path from legacy technologies to a converged communications network supporting all Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITS) on highways. - Prepare for the future of mobility: Get to know our C-V2X and roadside cloud solutions for vehicle-to-everything (V2X), analytics for automated driving and traveler infotainment.
Plan to attend our presentation in the Smart Mobility Theatre 2 (Hall 8) on Wednesday, 21st March from 11:00 to 11:45: “The future of connected mobility: beyond autonomous horses".
Registration here <[[http://go.nokia.com/NR008W0V000b04Z0TU0003S]]> to the event is free of charge.
For more information on Nokia solutions for intelligent highways, visit our webpage <[[http://go.nokia.com/iN4W0URb02S00V000003Z00]]>.
Look for us in Amsterdam Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
